content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing 61 and 95 iron plates respectively

### Additional Production Line (Position x=5.5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5) containing 101 and 131 copper plates respectively

### Research Facility
Consists of:
- Two labs connected to electricity network (id=3592)
- Labs contain automation science packs (3 and 7 respectively)

### Power Generation System (Position around x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at position (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5)
- PipeGroup connecting water from pump to boiler (fluid system 1999)
- PipeGroup connecting steam from boiler to engine (fluid system 2000)
- Connected to electricity network (id=3592)

### Electricity Distribution
- ElectricityGroup (id=3592) consisting of multiple electric poles connecting power generation to labs

### Unused Structure
- Disconnected offshore pump at position (-5.5,26.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Errors
- Check if a technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Both Automation and Logistics technologies were already completed

### Furnace Operation Issues
- All furnaces are showing "no ingredients to smelt" warnings
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials to furnaces for continuous operation

### Fluid System Warning
- Disconnected offshore pump shows "No fluid present in connections" warning
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to a fluid system if intended for use
